rules_text:
Starsea Slayer enters tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step.
Sacrifice a creature: Untap Starsea Slayer.
[i]Augmented[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, create three 1/1 Wonder creature tokens that are all colors.
